text: Oni rady byli okazat'sya v chisle ostavshikhsya zhenshchin, invalidov i detey, ne uchastvuyushchikh v pokhode. Allakh nalozhil na ikh serdtsa pechat' strakha i litsemeriya, tak chto oni ne ponimayut, chto v srazhenii vo imya Allakha i v sledovanii Yego proroku - ikh sila i schast'ye v blizhney zhizni, i ray - v posleduyushchey zhizni
